title: WeWork Founder Adam Neumann’s Trove of Pricey Properties
text:
While his company WeWork was gobbling up prime office space amid its transformation into one of the world’s largest commercial tenants, founder Adam Neumann and his wife Rebekah Paltrow Neumann were purchasing some of the country’s priciest homes.

They include two places in Manhattan: a townhouse on Greenwich Village’s “Gold Coast” and a four-condo compound just off of Gramercy Park. There is a sprawling farm in Westchester, N.Y., and two homes in the Hamptons, one of which shares a property line with actress and Goop founder...
description: In good times, the entrepreneur borrowed hundreds of millions, snapped up at least six homes, and was eyeing more. Then last month happened.
